attributes.action: No longer support the practice of home repossesions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Finacial institutions should be ordered by courts of law to no longer grant reposesion orders. Governent must find away to make banks  allow lower payments( including payment holidays), from less fortunates who have lost everything including jobs,to lessen the strain on an economy that will have to borrow further to house families on benefits

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
